Text.Page:
Greetings, . I've a special mission for someone of your talents.

Mistmoor Island just east of here...reports of pirates ashore. Not much intel, and you know what the brass does when they can't think of a good idea? They send us!

There's an expeditionary force from Kaia's Sword on the island right now. Link up with them and deal with those corsairs.

If you're from Cutthroat Harbor, that must mean they have soldiers to spare. Lucky for them, I suppose.

Well, we aren't about to send you away. Good to have another aboard.
